name: Masked Heroes: Kart Racing 3D
description:
Drive into an action-packed experience. Be part of this Car Racing tournament as a young masked superhero. It is a top toddler game for free. Race against a field of rival drivers with special skills. Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to many weapons and powerups!

Proove your skills in more than 40 race tracks. This is the perfect 5 year old games for boys and girls! Utilize your driving skills and a collection of creative powerups to fight your way to the finish line. You can play it anywhere you like. It's perfectly entertaining game for junior and kids.

Amazing game Features:
- Exciting Kart action races & kart racing action
- Very cool 3D cars with HD Graphics and effects
- Tons of amazing powerups
- 40 enjoyable racing tracks
- Collect special items to upgrade superhero skills

Enjoy This Amazing game & Don't Forget to leave us a REVIEW :)
